long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The MTGstand chrome extension adds a card value to any Magic the Gathering card ebay auction. The extension supports any ebay search pages, seller pages, single auction pages and any ebay view settings (line or gallery view). So you always get the card value right next to the auction price no matter where you are.
Currently it scans the auction title for cardname, set name, set code, collector number, special effects like "foil", "borderless", "showcase" and "extended art" and than the extension gets the current card value, a link to the MTGstand single card page and to the scryfall page.
